```{r, include = FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
library(plotfunctions)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
Exp1B <- c(6,4,3)
Exp2 <- c(14,2,2)

pie(Exp1B, labels = c("Yes", "No", "Unsure"))
pie(Exp2, labels = c("Yes", "No", "Unsure"))

Exp1B <- data.frame(label = c("Yes", "No", "Unsure"), value = c(6,4,3))

bp<- ggplot(Exp1B, aes(x="", y = value , fill = label)) + geom_bar(width = 1, stat = "identity")
bp
pie <- bp + coord_polar('y', start = 0)
pie

pie + scale_fill_manual(values=c("lightcoral","gold", "darkolivegreen2" )) + theme_minimal()




blank_theme <- theme_minimal()+
  theme(
  axis.title.x = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  panel.grid=element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  plot.title=element_text(size=14, face="bold")
  )

pie + scale_fill_manual(values=c("lightcoral","gold", "darkolivegreen2" )) + blank_theme

```
